content: this legal case is being heard in the municipal court gospić it started on march 30 2023 and the procedure has been ongoing since april 5 2022 after 11 months a final resolution has been reached the coownership of four properties has been terminated and transferred to the sole ownership of applicant o v one of the properties is a meadow spanning 303 hectares the remaining properties will be registered solely under the ownership of counterparties 14 based on their existing coownership ratios the land registry department court will implement this resolution the decision was made based on article 50 paragraph 1 of the property act which was filed by the applicant to dissolve the coownership the court found the applicants proposal acceptable especially since counterparties 3 and 4 agreed despite counterparty 2 not attending the hearings
